feed.title: Category: Professor Layton and the Last Specter | MECHAkunEX Media Diary

entry.title: Game: Professor Layton and the Last Specter (DS, 2011)
entry.content: I haven't been doing puzzles for about two months, so I decided to start again today. So far, the story is very intriguing and the Emmy character is funny. Normally these games take a while to get to interesting puzzles, though.
